name: Guavalyptus
description: Just a quick something I threw together to fight off the vaper’s tongue I’ve been getting with the Fire Cured NETs I’ve been vaping. I had a buddy try it thinking I’d trick him in to trying something he hated, but then he said it was beautiful, so I reckon I’ll share it with the world. I don’t know if any place in the US carries the INW Aloe- it was an impulse buy the last time I ordered direct from Inawera. You could probably just use a lil bit of INW Cactus.
author: ChemicalBurnVictim
